metadata.title: CVE-2024-9936 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: When manipulating the selection node cache, an attacker may have been ableto cause unexpected behavior, potentially leading to an exploitable crash.This vulnerability affects Firefox < 131.0.3.

criterions.comment: mozjs115: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
